2 import rospy
3 import rospkg
4 import os
5 import base64
6 
7 # Messages
8 from niryo_robot_sound.msg import SoundList
9 
10 # Services
11 from niryo_robot_sound.srv import ManageSound
12 
13 # Command Status
14 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
15 
16 from niryo_robot_sound.sound_object import Sound, SoundFormatException, SoundFileException
17 
18 
19 class SoundDatabase:
20  """
21  Object which configure the sound management on the robot
22  """
23 
24  def __init__(self):
25  self.__simulation_mode = rospy.get_param("~simulation_mode")
26 
27  self.__user_sound_directory_path = os.path.expanduser(
28  rospy.get_param("~path_user_sound_simulation" if self.__simulation_mode else "~path_user_sound"))
29  if not os.path.isdir(self.__user_sound_directory_path):
30  os.makedirs(self.__user_sound_directory_path)
31 
32  self.__robot_sound_directory_path = os.path.join(rospkg.RosPack().get_path('niryo_robot_sound'),
33  rospy.get_param("~path_robot_sound"))
34 
35  self.__system_sounds = [sound for sound in list(rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds").values())]
36  self.__error_sound_name = rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds/error_sound")
37  self.__turn_on_sound_name = rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds/turn_on_sound")
38  self.__turn_off_sound_name = rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds/turn_off_sound")
39  self.__connection_sound = rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds/connection_sound")
40  self.__robot_ready_sound = rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds/robot_ready_sound")
41  self.__calibration_sound = rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds/calibration_sound")
42  self.__warning_sound = rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds/warn_sound")
43  self.__reboot_sound = rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds/reboot_sound")
44  self.__learning_trajectory_sound = rospy.get_param("~robot_sounds/learning_trajectory_sound")
45  self.__robot_sounds = {}
46  self.__user_sounds = {}
47 
48  self.__load_user_sounds()
49  self.__load_robot_sounds()
50 
51  # - Publishers
52  self.__sound_database_publisher = rospy.Publisher('/niryo_robot_sound/sound_database',
53  SoundList,
54  latch=True,
55  queue_size=10)
56  self.__publish_sounds()
57 
58  # - Services
59  rospy.Service('/niryo_robot_sound/manage', ManageSound, self.__callback_manage_sound)
60 
61  def __call__(self, *args, **kwargs):
62  if len(args) >= 1:
63  return self.get_sound(args[0])
64  return None
65 
66  # - Properties and getters
67  @property
68  def user_sounds(self):
69  return self.__user_sounds
70 
71  @property
72  def robot_sounds(self):
73  return self.__robot_sounds
74 
75  @property
76  def error_sound(self):
77  return self.__robot_sounds[self.__error_sound_name]
78 
79  @property
80  def wake_up_sound(self):
81  return self.__robot_sounds[self.__turn_on_sound_name]
82 
83  @property
84  def sleep_sound(self):
85  return self.__robot_sounds[self.__turn_off_sound_name]
86

88  def connection_sound(self):
89  return self.__robot_sounds[self.__connection_sound]
90

92  def robot_ready_sound(self):
93  return self.__robot_sounds[self.__robot_ready_sound]
94

96  def calibration_sound(self):
97  return self.__robot_sounds[self.__calibration_sound]
98

101  return self.__robot_sounds[self.__reboot_sound]

105  return self.__robot_sounds[self.__warning_sound]

107  @property
108  def learning_trajectory_sound(self):
109  return self.__robot_sounds[self.__learning_trajectory_sound]
110 
111  @property
112  def state_sound_directory_path(self):
113  return self.__robot_sound_directory_path
114 
115  @property
116  def user_sound_directory_path(self):
117  return self.__user_sound_directory_path
118 
119  def get_sound(self, sound_name):
120  if sound_name in self.__user_sounds:
121  return self.__user_sounds[sound_name]
122  elif sound_name in self.__robot_sounds:
123  return self.__robot_sounds[sound_name]
124  return None
125 
126  # - Callbacks
127  def __callback_manage_sound(self, req):
128  if req.action == req.ADD:
129  return self.add_sound(req.sound_name, req.sound_data)
130  elif req.action == req.DELETE:
131  return self.delete_sound(req.sound_name)
132  else:
133  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Incorrect action (ADD: 1, DELETE: 2)"
134 
135  def delete_sound(self, sound_name):
136  if sound_name in self.__robot_sounds:
137  return CommandStatus.PROTECTED_SOUND_NAME, "Failure to delete {} sound, this sound is protected".format(
138  sound_name)
139  elif sound_name not in self.__user_sounds:
140  return CommandStatus.SOUND_FILE_NOT_FOUND, "Failure to delete {} sound, file doesn't exist".format(
141  sound_name)
142 
143  try:
144  sound_file_path = self.__user_sounds[sound_name].path
145  self.__user_sounds.pop(sound_name)
146  os.remove(sound_file_path)
147  self.__publish_sounds()
148  except OSError:
149  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Failure to delete the {} sound , file doesn't exist".format(sound_name)
150 
151  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "{} Sound successfully deleted".format(sound_name)
152 
153  def add_sound(self, sound_name, raw_sound_data):
154  if not (sound_name.endswith('.mp3') or sound_name.endswith('.wav')):
155  return CommandStatus.INVALID_SOUND_FORMAT, "The {}file must be in .mp3 or .wav format".format(sound_name)
156 
157  if sound_name in self.__user_sounds:
158  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Failure to write the {} sound, this name already exists".format(sound_name)
159  elif sound_name in self.__robot_sounds:
160  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Failure to write the {} sound, this name is protected".format(sound_name)
161 
162  # Split the sound_data to keep just the encoded data that we need
163  try:
164  decoded_base64_sound_data = raw_sound_data.split("base64,")[1]
165  except IndexError:
166  decoded_base64_sound_data = raw_sound_data
167 
168  encoded_base64_sound_data = decoded_base64_sound_data.encode('utf-8')
169 
170  # delete the padding to be able to decode the sound_data properly
171  missing_padding = len(encoded_base64_sound_data) % 4
172  if missing_padding != 0:
173  encoded_base64_sound_data += b'=' * (4 - missing_padding)
174  # decode the sound_data
175  sound_data = base64.decodebytes(encoded_base64_sound_data)
176 
177  # Create the new soundFile and put the decoded sound_data on it
178  sound_file_path = os.path.join(self.__user_sound_directory_path, sound_name)
179  try:
180  with open(sound_file_path, 'wb') as sound_file:
181  sound_file.write(sound_data)
182  except IOError:
183  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Failure to write the {} sound".format(sound_name)
184  try:
185  self.__user_sounds[sound_name] = Sound(sound_name, sound_file_path)
186  self.__publish_sounds()
187  except SoundFormatException:
188  os.remove(sound_file_path)
189  return CommandStatus.INVALID_SOUND_FORMAT, "The {} file does not appear to be an audio file".format(
190  sound_name)
191 
192  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "{} sound successfully deleted".format(sound_name)
193 
194  def refresh_user_sounds(self):
195  self.__load_user_sounds()
196 
197  # # - Publishers
198 
199  def __load_user_sounds(self):
200  # Get a list with the names of the user's sounds
201  sound_names = os.listdir(self.__user_sound_directory_path)
202  for sound_name in sound_names:
203  if (sound_name.endswith('.mp3') or sound_name.endswith('.wav')) and sound_name not in self.__user_sounds:
204  try:
205  self.__user_sounds[sound_name] = Sound(sound_name,
206  os.path.join(self.__user_sound_directory_path, sound_name))
207  except (SoundFormatException, SoundFileException) as e:
208  rospy.logwarn(f"File {sound_name} doesn't appear to be an audio file: {e}")
209 
210  def __load_robot_sounds(self):
211  self.__robot_sounds = {
212  sound_name: Sound(sound_name, os.path.join(self.__robot_sound_directory_path, sound_name))
213  for sound_name in self.__system_sounds
214  }
215 
216  def __publish_sounds(self):
217  msg = SoundList()
218  msg.sounds = [
219  sound.to_msg() for sound in list(self.__user_sounds.values()) + list(self.__robot_sounds.values())
220  ]
221 
222  try:
223  self.__sound_database_publisher.publish(msg)
224  except rospy.ROSException:
225  return
